roleset.name: look at again

example.name: review-v: simple transitive
example.text: Late yesterday , Georgia Gulf said it reviewed the NL proposal as well as interests from `` third parties '' regarding business combinations .

propbank.arg: the NL proposal as well as interests from `` third parties '' regarding business combinations

example.name: review-v: with benefactive
example.text: `` We consider that his bid is an acceptable bid , '' said Sandra Kolber , spokeswoman for the independent directors ' committee appointed last May to solicit and review bids for the company in the wake of a dispute between Mr. Drabinsky and Cineplex 's major shareholder , MCA Inc.

propbank.arg: in the wake of a dispute between Mr. Drabinsky and Cineplex 's major shareholder , MCA Inc.

example.name: review-v: with purpose adjunct
example.text: Meanwhile , U.S. Attorney Jerry Rafferty in Denver is reviewing the report prepared by MiniScribe 's outside directors , to determine if criminal charges should be brought before a grand jury .

propbank.arg: U.S. Attorney Jerry Rafferty in Denver
the report prepared by MiniScribe 's outside directors
to determine if criminal charges should be brought before a grand jury

example.name: review-v: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: First up was a conference at National Taiwan University on the subject of reviewing the cases of persons persecuted as " communist spies . "

propbank.arg: the cases of persons persecuted as " communist spies

example.name: review-n: Example with arg 0 and 1
example.text: no mandatory appellate review of capital sentences

example.name: review-n: Example with arg 3
example.text: a daily news review of opinions from around the world

propbank.arg: of opinions from around the world

example.name: review-n: Example with tmp and arg 1
example.text: The annual review of China 's trade status

example.name: review-n: Example with arg 0
example.text: He hopes to try the procedure in people within 5 years following U.S. government review .

example.name: review-n: Example with a slightly different arg 0
example.text: It 's lengthy review in the legislature
